subject: Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Sports Injuries
Concussions
College Athletics
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
lead_paragraph: The settlement brings a significant change in the care and safety of current and former college athletes, including a $70 million medical monitoring fund and a new national protocol for head injuries.
snippet: The settlement brings a significant change in the care and safety of current and former college athletes, including a $70 million medical monitoring fund and a new national protocol for head injuries.
